org.fosstrak.hal.impl.impinj.comm
Class Frame

java.lang.Object
  org.fosstrak.hal.impl.impinj.comm.Frame

public class Frame
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a communication frame of the Mach1 protocol.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2007

Jonas Haller
